function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Indoor spread of infectious diseases by the conditions of HVAC systems.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission and contamination of indoor spaces.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of HVAC systems, use of high-efficiency air filters, and implementation of UVGI technology.","Technologies":"UVGI technology, high-efficiency air filters, regular maintenance of HVAC systems.","People":"Residents, workers, visitors in indoor spaces.","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, HVAC maintenance professionals."},{"Description":"Potential health risk of respiratory virus transmission in air-conditioned rooms.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of virus transmission and contamination in enclosed spaces.","Mitigation":"Implementation of innovative air circulation concepts, use of UVGI and nanoporous air filters.","Technologies":"UVGI technology, nanoporous air filters, innovative air circulation concepts.","People":"Residents, workers, visitors in indoor spaces.","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, HVAC maintenance professionals."},{"Description":"Control of indoor temperature and humidity during the epidemic period.","Impact":"Influences the survival and vitality of viruses in indoor air and on surfaces.","Mitigation":"Maintaining indoor temperature and humidity within a controlled range, increasing filter efficiency, and accelerating air changes.","Technologies":"Central air conditioning systems, high-efficiency air filters, ventilation systems.","People":"Residents, workers, visitors in indoor spaces.","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, HVAC maintenance professionals."}]}
